news.title: Applebee’s and IHOP Embrace AI to Revolutionize Dining Experience
news.body: Applebee’s and IHOP, under Dine Brands, are integrating AI to enhance customer service and operational efficiency across their 3,500 locations. This tech infusion aims to personalize customer interactions and optimize kitchen operations, potentially setting a new standard in the hospitality industry.

news.title: X Ventures into Fintech with Trading Services and Card Offerings
news.body: X, previously known as Twitter, is expanding into financial services with new trading capabilities and potential debit or credit card products. This strategic move could transform how social media platforms intersect with personal financial management, offering users a seamless financial experience.

news.title: UK Government Expands Open Banking with Smart Data Group Initiative
news.body: The UK government has launched the Smart Data Group to extend open banking principles to other sectors, aiming to unlock a £28 billion economic potential. This initiative could revolutionize data sharing and consumer benefits, setting a precedent for global financial data integration.

news.title: Coinbase Launches Stablecoin Payment Service for Merchants Globally
news.body: Coinbase has introduced a new stablecoin payment service, allowing merchants worldwide to accept USDC transactions. This development marks a significant step in the adoption of cryptocurrencies in mainstream commerce, offering a more stable and secure digital payment option.

news.title: Visa Promotes Institutional Stablecoin Strategies in CEMEA Region
news.body: Visa is enhancing its blockchain-based settlement capabilities in the CEMEA region, advocating for financial institutions to develop stablecoin strategies. This move highlights Visa's commitment to integrating digital currencies into the financial ecosystem, potentially reshaping global payment systems.
